errors.error_description: The Postgres dependency `postgresql-server-dev-9.5` has its required version removed. Listing it as `postgresql-server-dev` can cause package managers to install a newer, incompatible version of Postgres.
correction_candidates: Specify the version by changing `postgresql-server-dev` to `postgresql-server-dev-9.5`.
Add a note saying 'Postgres version 9.5 is required'.
Change the dependency to `postgresql-server-dev-all` to support multiple versions.
Remove the Postgres dependency and use Docker instead.
errors.golden_answer: Specify the version by changing `postgresql-server-dev` to `postgresql-server-dev-9.5`.
